actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution urging the Secretary of State to expel any diplomat to the United States who incites individuals residing in the United States to engage in illegal actions which threaten the public safety or public tranquility.

summary.text: Urges the Secretary of State to expel any public minister or diplomat in the United States who incites individuals residing in the United States to engage in any violation of State or Federal law which would endanger public safety and tranquility.

titles.title: A resolution urging the Secretary of State to expel any diplomat to the United States who incites individuals residing in the United States to engage in illegal actions which threaten the public safety or public tranquility.
